message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can always negotiate more later.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split.  This accounts for the time value of money with the inflation we're facing.
I'm willing to go down to 70/30.  We both need to be flexible to make this work. Let's get this done.
Alice, we're running out of time, and the value is slipping away.  55/45 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
